readable.title: 3479050296_65bcea69a0
readable.content: Three kids laugh , a girl in the middle with a red jacket and red tie , a boy on either side . Three smiling children sitting on a wooden bench Three well-dressed children are sitting on a bench and smiling . Three young children in colorful clothes are sitting on a bench close together . Two boys one in a green shirt and one in a blue shirt and a girl in a red jacket and tie on a brown bench .
